steps.copy: Gentle lip trill or hum for about a minute. Keep it easy.

steps.title: Pitch Glide
steps.copy: Glide smoothly up, then down. Aim for steady movement (no sudden jumps).

steps.title: Prosody Phrase
steps.copy: Say: "How are you doing?" with a gentle rise at the end.
